response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item is truly a game-changer and I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its high value and unique features, I estimate its worth to be around $15,000 to us. Considering its immense potential impact on your business or life, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents an outstanding value, allowing you to benefit from its capabilities without breaking the bank. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope we can discuss further how it can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 12000}
